readability_reflection: I would have to say string concatenation as I am simply more familiar with the syntax. To compound, the idea of addition is also more natural than substitution when combining literals together - for me at least.
comprehension_debugging: I don't have enough experience to comment on this.
preference_rationale: I would prefer the latter for the same reasons listed above.
learning_curve: I had almost no experience with string interpolation so I had to do a quick google search to fully understand the process before starting the survey.
